definitions.definition: The simplest aliphatic hydrocarbon , CH₄ , being a constituent of natural gas , and one of the most abundant greenhouse gases .
examples: Cattle emit a large amount of methane .

definitions.definition: Any of very many derivatives of methane.

main_definition: ( organic chemistry , uncountable ) The simplest aliphatic hydrocarbon , CH₄ , being a constituent of natural gas , and one of the most abundant greenhouse gases .
secondary_definitions: ( organic chemistry , countable ) Any of very many derivatives of methane.
